title: Cosmic Syndra

embed.description: Hey everyone!! The semester is finally finished which means more time for drawing! This is my latest idea - Cosmic Syndra. Hope you guys enjoy it! For some reason i like drawing blue people hahaha

body:
Riot pls hire this person.

The fucking hair. I wish i had this hair..

Art by [BlandStuffTastesNice](http://www.deviantart.com/art/Cosmic-Syndra-615446961) on DA

replies.body: neet i <3 IT!! <3{{champion:134}}  you could also make her orbs like tiny universes!! (OuO)b
https://media.giphy.com/media/EldfH1VJdbrwY/giphy.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Bilby,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vvE2mE7B,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-09-27T05:49:48.265+0000)
>
> https://media.giphy.com/media/EldfH1VJdbrwY/giphy.gif

I really wish as well Cosmic Syndra who throws tiny universes made into orbs would come true! :P
http://www.cinemacats.com/wp-content/uploads/movies/meninblack04.jpg
It'd be nearly impossible to do the effect without making it look like the Void layer (see: Malzahar Q, Kassadin R).
Dark Star for sure would be sick on Syndra
Dark star is like.... her classic skin.
Cosmic or even dark star would work for her

cosmic reaver syndra would probably be better (dark star is kinda in her classic's range of colors already)

gold and blue from cosmic reaver wouldn't clash as much with justicar/atlantean
i would pay anything for this skin
I definitely like this idea
well shit this skin won't happen now. If it does it will end up like Arcade Riven, completely different.
be nice if her sphere change color deending on her level to represent the heat intensity red=low, yellow= med, blue =high just to add some science to it
More Syndra skins PLEASE
"I'm going to throw a star at you now. Good luck."
this was so good im going to make it my desktop background
Aurelion Syndra?
love the colors!
Aurelion Sol approves of this skin.
Damn lil mama those thighs thicker than a bowl of oatmeal.

Dark Star would be to closely resemble her Classic Skin.

I also feel like Cosmic Syndra is.. Eh, 6/10. I think It's really good art work and design by the artist but I just don't really enjoy it for Syndra.

I wish I knew who the artist was but I would really like to see these Syndra's.

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/originals/81/d0/b0/81d0b0e3a78f339ff807c3fff1a63da2.jpg

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/originals/a5/fb/d5/a5fbd52235a93f6add60d95fd50a5a44.jpg

http://apollo-pbe-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1402852065008/skin_syndra_halloween_by_cmorilla-d7mb7r3.jpg

Yes, YES. Take my money- just take it now!! We need a Dark themed Syndra and right now would be perfect!! Riot look into this ASAP!

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
